column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Absolutely amazing! Tried the Nutella croissant
column3: and another croissant that had caramelized butter on top
column4: and they were all incredible! Nothing short of a 10/10 for the pastries. We also ordered the bacon and egg flatbread and the French toast with fresh strawberries
column5: and we cleared the plates! Can't wait to go again!
